summary: A young college graduate is struggling to find a job. He lives in a flat with his younger, employed sister, revolutionary brother and widowed mother. The strain of the situation ultimately causes him to hallucinate.
cast: Dhritiman Chatterjee|Asgar Ali|Arabinda Banerjee|Soumitra Bannerjee|Amar Bardhan|Gaja Basu|Krishna Bose|Biplab Chakraborty|Mihir Chakravarti|Anindita Chatterjee|Biplab Chatterjee|Chittaranjan Chatterjee|Dibyendu Chatterjee|Kalyan Chatterjee|Mamata Chatterjee|Ranajit Chatterjee|Bhaskar Roy Chowdhury|Indrani Roy Chowdhury|Ratanlal Chowdhury|Bishnupada Das|Kaushik Deb|Indira Devi|Arun Dey|Ajit Gangopadhyay|Anil Ganguly|Ajit Ghosh|K.K. Iyengar|Mulesh Jain|Jayasree Kabir|Soven Lahiri|Abdul Majid|Pisu Majumdar|Ashok Mitra|Arya Mukherjee|Samir Nag|Mihir Pal|Rajesh|Parameshwar Raut|Debraj Ray|B.P. Roy|Dhara Roy|Indra Roy|Nihar Roy|Tapan Roy|Anja Savarwal|Chandi Sen|Kalyan Sen|Miss Shefali
title: Pratidwandi
